phrs.translation: 保持安全距离；远些距离

sentences.sentence: Have you got my berthing instruction?
Just...... Do not know your harbour, whether it is my final berthing!
sentences.translation: 只是……不知道你的港湾，是否是我最终的停泊！

sentences.sentence: If the vessel directly berths, NOR shall be tendered upon berthing after free pratique.
sentences.translation: 如果船只直接进入泊位，应在获得入港许可、靠泊后发出备妥通知。
